issue.title: Test failures in arquitectures different to amd64

content.raw:
UNIT_Line2_TEST (mostly in 32 bits) should be fixed with pull request #136

Some other failures currently at this moment:

**UNIT_Box_TEST (Box Intersect) in x86**
[Debian log](https://buildd.debian.org/status/fetch.php?pkg=ignition-math2&arch=i386&ver=2.5.0-2&stamp=1480353290)
```
[ RUN      ] BoxTest.Intersect
/«PKGBUILDDIR»/src/Box_TEST.cc:353: Failure
Value of: intersect
  Actual: false
Expected: true
/«PKGBUILDDIR»/src/Box_TEST.cc:355: Failure
Value of: b.IntersectCheck(math::Vector3d(2, 1, 0), math::Vector3d(-1, -1, 0), 0, 1000)
  Actual: false
Expected: true
/«PKGBUILDDIR»/src/Box_TEST.cc:356: Failure
      Expected: dist
      Which is: 0
To be equal to: 1.41421356237309504880
      Which is: 1.4142135623730951
/«PKGBUILDDIR»/src/Box_TEST.cc:359: Failure
      Expected: pt
      Which is: 0 0 0
To be equal to: math::Vector3d(1, 0, 0)
      Which is: 1 0 0
[  FAILED  ] BoxTest.Intersect (0 ms)
```
I've created a [dockerfile](http://pastebin.com/Uap5ettq) for reproducing the problem but it is not failing on my box.

**UNIT_Helper_TEST (Pair) in non x86**
```
[ RUN      ] HelpersTest.Pair
/«PKGBUILDDIR»/src/Helpers_TEST.cc:346: Failure
      Expected: maxC
      Which is: 0
To be equal to: maxA
      Which is: 4294967295
/«PKGBUILDDIR»/src/Helpers_TEST.cc:419: Failure
      Expected: a
      Which is: 4294962295
To be equal to: c
      Which is: 4294962296
/«PKGBUILDDIR»/src/Helpers_TEST.cc:420: Failure
      Expected: b
      Which is: 4294962295
To be equal to: d
      Which is: 4999
/«PKGBUILDDIR»/src/Helpers_TEST.cc:419: Failure
      Expected: a
      Which is: 4294962296
To be equal to: c
      Which is: 4294962297
/«PKGBUILDDIR»/src/Helpers_TEST.cc:420: Failure
      Expected: b
      Which is: 4294962295
To be equal to: d
      Which is: 4997
/«PKGBUILDDIR»/src/Helpers_TEST.cc:419: Failure
      Expected: a
      Which is: 4294962296
To be equal to: c
      Which is: 4294962297
/«PKGBUILDDIR»/src/Helpers_TEST.cc:420: Failure
      Expected: b
```
content.html:
UNIT_Line2_TEST (mostly in 32 bits) should be fixed with pull request #136

Some other failures currently at this moment:

UNIT_Box_TEST (Box Intersect) in x86 Debian log

[ RUN      ] BoxTest.Intersect
/«PKGBUILDDIR»/src/Box_TEST.cc:353: Failure
Value of: intersect
  Actual: false
Expected: true
/«PKGBUILDDIR»/src/Box_TEST.cc:355: Failure
Value of: b.IntersectCheck(math::Vector3d(2, 1, 0), math::Vector3d(-1, -1, 0), 0, 1000)
  Actual: false
Expected: true
/«PKGBUILDDIR»/src/Box_TEST.cc:356: Failure
      Expected: dist
      Which is: 0
To be equal to: 1.41421356237309504880
      Which is: 1.4142135623730951
/«PKGBUILDDIR»/src/Box_TEST.cc:359: Failure
      Expected: pt
      Which is: 0 0 0
To be equal to: math::Vector3d(1, 0, 0)
      Which is: 1 0 0
[  FAILED  ] BoxTest.Intersect (0 ms)

I've created a dockerfile for reproducing the problem but it is not failing on my box.

UNIT_Helper_TEST (Pair) in non x86

[ RUN      ] HelpersTest.Pair
/«PKGBUILDDIR»/src/Helpers_TEST.cc:346: Failure
      Expected: maxC
      Which is: 0
To be equal to: maxA
      Which is: 4294967295
/«PKGBUILDDIR»/src/Helpers_TEST.cc:419: Failure
      Expected: a
      Which is: 4294962295
To be equal to: c
      Which is: 4294962296
/«PKGBUILDDIR»/src/Helpers_TEST.cc:420: Failure
      Expected: b
      Which is: 4294962295
To be equal to: d
      Which is: 4999
/«PKGBUILDDIR»/src/Helpers_TEST.cc:419: Failure
      Expected: a
      Which is: 4294962296
To be equal to: c
      Which is: 4294962297
/«PKGBUILDDIR»/src/Helpers_TEST.cc:420: Failure
      Expected: b
      Which is: 4294962295
To be equal to: d
      Which is: 4997
/«PKGBUILDDIR»/src/Helpers_TEST.cc:419: Failure
      Expected: a
      Which is: 4294962296
To be equal to: c
      Which is: 4294962297
/«PKGBUILDDIR»/src/Helpers_TEST.cc:420: Failure
      Expected: b
